World Bank's Banga denies IFC cover up of abuse involving Kenya school investmentWorld Bank President Ajay Banga on Monday rejected allegations that the bank's International Finance Corp arm sought to cover up reports of sexual abuse at a for-profit school chain in Kenya in which it held a stake from 2013 to 2022. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:50:48 GMT RDEMITJX4ZLAFD6IEHBIHS66D4 https://www.reuters.com/world/world-banks-banga-denies-ifc-cover-up-abuse-involving-kenya-school-investment-2024-02-06/David Lawder世界
Australian govt seeks to pass tax cuts bill as parliament resumesThe Australian government will push ahead with plans to pass its reshaped tax cuts bill, that aims to give low-income earners more breaks while trimming benefits to the wealthy, as the parliament resumes on Tuesday for the first time this year. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:46:19 GMT CMT4X2OXYNLQ3MVWHPYU7DIK3E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-govt-seeks-pass-tax-cuts-bill-parliament-resumes-2024-02-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
British Columbia minister resigns for Palestine commentsA senior government minister in the Canadian province of British Columbia resigned on Monday after saying last week that modern Israel was founded on a "crappy piece of land," a comment that outraged pro-Palestinian groups. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:44:48 GMT 2OIFHDHBHVIJJO7FIYSVIA4XHM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/british-columbia-minister-resigns-palestine-comments-2024-02-06/Reuters世界美洲
Mexico's president seeks broad constitutional reforms ahead of June electionsMexico's president proposed sweeping constitutional reforms in a speech on Monday, including measures to overhaul the judiciary, electoral law, pensions, and environmental regulations, just months before a presidential election. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:08:14 GMT FRB7HOOP5RPZPDHRNQ6F6VA2TM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexicos-president-lays-out-constitutional-reforms-2024-02-06/Reuters世界美洲
UK minister to meet with U.S. lawmakers on restoration of Northern Ireland governmentBritain's minister for Northern Ireland, Chris Heaton-Harris, will travel to Washington to discuss the restoration of the province's devolved government with U.S. lawmakers and market its economic potential, his department said on Tuesday. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:06:59 GMT BEMTOJBPT5K6HDGTSEWBZNKEAY https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-minister-meet-with-us-lawmakers-restoration-northern-ireland-government-2024-02-06/Reuters世界
Thailand confident aid effort will lead to Myanmar crisis dialogueA new Thailand-led humanitarian initiative aims to pave the way for talks between warring camps in military-ruled Myanmar, a senior Thai official said, three years after a coup triggered instability and a wave of violence across the country. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:03:17 GMT DIODTM4M4RMA7IS2QZIPQTM6HE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-confident-aid-effort-will-lead-myanmar-crisis-dialogue-2024-02-06/Panu Wongcha-Um世界亚太地区
Biden threatens veto of U.S. House's 'political ploy' Israel billU.S. President Joe Biden's administration said on Monday he would veto a standalone bill backed by House of Representatives Republicans that would provide aid to Israel, as it pushes for a broader measure providing assistance to Ukraine and Israel and providing new funds for border security. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:44:04 GMT MYTRQXYUFJPUVJQDGVR5MJBB4U https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-threatens-veto-us-houses-standalone-israel-aid-bill-2024-02-05/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Russia accuses Biden of seeking election boost with Syria, Iraq strikesRussia accused President Joe Biden on Monday of carrying out strikes in Iraq and Syria to boost his image as the presidential election campaign "is heating up" - not in retaliation for a deadly attack on U.S. soldiers. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:36:16 GMT BYWRDGWADRKEJBJQJKMMOJTGOE https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-accuses-biden-seeking-election-boost-with-syria-iraq-strikes-2024-02-05/Michelle Nichols世界
New Zealand national day protesters demonstrate for Indigenous rightsRoughly 600 protesters on Tuesday marched to where New Zealand’s founding document was signed in the town of Waitangi, as official celebrations competed with protests against proposed government policies that threaten Indigenous rights. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:15:23 GMT CWF5OJEPQJM4PABBXSYLPIHKNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-national-day-protesters-demonstrate-indigenous-rights-2024-02-05/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
Police move to end Dutch farmer protestsDutch police moved on Monday to end demonstrations by farmers who disrupted traffic throughout the Netherlands by blocking exit roads of highways and setting fires along those roads. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:02:03 GMT 5M2VKTSCGJKRXA3DWLJ5LAMLLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/police-move-end-dutch-farmer-protests-2024-02-05/Reuters世界欧洲
China court's suspended death sentence for Australian writer an 'outrage,' PM saysAustralia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese on Tuesday said it was an "outrage" that a Beijing court handed Australian writer Yang Hengjun a suspended death sentence on espionage charges and vowed to continue to make efforts for his release. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:40:49 GMT K3QNTVSJ3NIZRNTM2UA4YW7P7A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-courts-suspended-death-sentence-australian-writer-an-outrage-pm-says-2024-02-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
